componentX.description: A componentX is the value passed directly to blurhash.

componentY.description: A componentY is the value passed directly to blurhash.

emitFile.description: Don't emit the file if false is specified.

esModule.description: If enabled, use the ES modules syntax.

name.description: The filename template for the target file.

outputPath.description: A custom output path for the target file.

publicPath.description: A custom public path for the target file.
